p: The PAA- g-PEG copolymer 2, prepared as a control, was also analyzed by 1H-NMR spectroscopic analysis, and the ratio of acrylic acid to PEG-MEMA was calculated from the integral ratio of proton peaks of carboxylic acid (H 1) and PEG (H 1) to be 70:1.6 (that is, y:z), the same as the ratio of acrylic acid to PEG-MEMA in PAU- g-PEG 1 (Figure S2 and Table S1).
